name: The Pumpkins Come
description:
A 2d rogue-lite action game with  (a small amount of) progression and character customization. The procedurally generated levels increase in Difficulty and size with each level you clear.  The enemies you meet will also vary based on your progression.

While this is a work in progress hobby project, the game has proper menus and user interface. All assets are hand made, no asset flipping. However some assets are still placeholder.

This game is far from finished so Feedback, comments, criticism and ideas are all greatly appreciated.
